This privacy policy describes which data and information is gathered about you through our websites and throughout our customer relationships, how we use the data, share and disclose such information, and the steps we take to protect such information, including but not limited to your rights pertaining to the personal data disclosed by you and your choices and controls vested in you by law regarding your personal data.
We may also disclose your information and Personal Data in response to a subpoena, summons, warrant, court order, or other legal process or as part of an investigation or request, whether formal or informal, from law enforcement or a government official.
We process your personal data for the following purposes: Customer relationship management We may use your email address or other information to contact you for administrative purposes, such as customer service, banking or payment related queries and to address intellectual property infringement, right of privacy violations, or defamation issues related to the personal data posted on the Service.
We will retain and use information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce our  Terms of Service, and comply with technical and legal requirements and constraints related to the security, integrity, and operation of the Services.

We use automated decision-making (incl. profiling) to identify personal profiles, online behaviour, age, and consumer habits.
We use this information to target advertising in our and others' online services and to develop our services.
